title: President Donald J. Trump’s Administration Is Preparing Critical Resources and Personnel to Support Hurricane Response Efforts – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Land & Agriculture	

Issued on:
September 13, 2018
The safety of American people is my absolute highest priority. We are sparing no expense.
						President Donald J. Trump					ENSURING FEDERAL READINESS: The Trump Administration has taken extensive steps to ensure the Federal Government is prepared for Hurricane Florence and other storms. THE RIGHT PEOPLE IN PLACE: The Trump Administration has already put thousands of Federal personnel in place to assist with response efforts for Hurricane Florence and other storms.PROVIDING NEEDED RESOURCES: The Trump Administration is dedicating resources to help private and public partners prepare and respond to the impact of these storms.
